item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>I remember (vaguely) that ride - going along on a boat or something. Matthew, you sound like your in 7th heaven with all these sessions - just how many .dots do techies need to confuse us?!!</p>
item.content:encoded: I remember (vaguely) that ride – going along on a boat or something. Matthew, you sound like your in 7th heaven with all these sessions – just how many .dots do techies need to confuse us?!!

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>You have to sing along for me - "it's a small world after all....." Little things are good!!</p>
item.content:encoded: You have to sing along for me – “it’s a small world after all…..” Little things are good!!
